metas.name: Severance
metas.description: Intriguing sci-fi premise with mystery elements, similar to 'Fallout' and 'Stranger Things', but with a more psychological thriller approach.

metas.name: The Boys
metas.description: Satirical superhero action with dark comedy, appealing to fans of 'One-Punch Man' and 'Rick and Morty'.

metas.name: Dark
metas.description: Mind-bending sci-fi mystery with time travel, aligning with the complex narratives of 'Stranger Things', 'Foundation', and 'Doctor Who'.

metas.name: Black Mirror
metas.description: Anthology series exploring dark and satirical themes related to technology, similar to 'Love, Death & Robots' and 'Rick and Morty'.

metas.name: Arrested Development
metas.description: Cult comedy with quirky characters and absurd situations, reminiscent of 'It's Always Sunny' and 'Scrubs'.

metas.name: Parks and Recreation
metas.description: Optimistic and heartwarming comedy with a strong ensemble cast, similar to 'Ted Lasso' and 'Scrubs'.

metas.name: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
metas.description: Police procedural comedy with an emphasis on character relationships, similar to 'Scrubs' and 'Ted Lasso' but with a crime-solving element.

metas.name: Community
metas.description: Meta comedy with pop culture references and ensemble cast dynamics, similar to 'Rick and Morty' and 'The Simpsons'.

metas.name: Peep Show
metas.description: British cringe comedy with awkward situations and relatable characters, similar to 'It's Always Sunny' and 'Brassic'.

metas.name: What We Do in the Shadows
metas.description: Mockumentary-style comedy about vampires, with absurdist humor similar to 'Rick and Morty' and 'It's Always Sunny'.

metas.name: The Good Place
metas.description: Philosophical comedy with a unique premise and character development, similar to 'Ted Lasso' and 'Rick and Morty' in its unexpected depth.

metas.name: Maniac
metas.description: Dark comedy with sci-fi and surreal elements, exploring mental health and identity, appealing to fans of 'Love, Death & Robots' and 'Rick and Morty'.

metas.name: Russian Doll
metas.description: Mystery with a time-looping element and character-driven narrative, similar to 'Stranger Things' but with a focus on personal growth.

metas.name: Ozark
metas.description: Dark crime drama with suspenseful storytelling, similar to 'The Night Manager' and 'Brassic' but with a more serious tone.

metas.name: Line of Duty
metas.description: British police procedural with complex characters and moral dilemmas, similar to 'The Night Manager' and other crime dramas watched.

metas.name: Bodyguard
metas.description: British political thriller with action and suspense, similar to 'The Night Manager' but with a focus on security and government conspiracy.

metas.name: The Queen's Gambit
metas.description: Period drama with a compelling narrative and strong character development, providing a different genre but similar quality to other dramas watched.

metas.name: Sherlock
metas.description: Modern update of the classic detective stories, fitting the 'Mystery' and 'Crime' interests while being exceptionally well-written and acted.

metas.name: Mr. Robot
metas.description: Psychological thriller with themes of hacking and social commentary, similar to the darker elements of 'HIS & HERS' and 'All Her Fault'.

metas.name: Killing Eve
metas.description: Spy thriller with dark humor and compelling characters, fitting the 'Drama', 'Mystery', and 'Crime' interests.

metas.name: The Umbrella Academy
metas.description: Superhero show with a dysfunctional family dynamic and quirky humor, blending action with family drama, which aligns with viewing history.

metas.name: Dirk Gently's Holistic Detective Agency
metas.description: Sci-fi mystery with a comedic twist and complex plotlines, akin to 'Doctor Who', 'Rick and Morty', and 'Stranger Things'.

metas.name: Happy!
metas.description: Dark comedy action show with a surreal premise and a unique visual style, appealing to fans of dark humor and animation.

metas.name: Cowboy Bebop
metas.description: Classic animated series with action, adventure, and sci-fi elements, similar to 'One-Punch Man' and 'Love, Death & Robots'.

metas.name: Arcane
metas.description: Animated series with a compelling story, stunning visuals, and mature themes, similar to 'Love, Death & Robots' but with a longer narrative arc.

metas.name: Invincible
metas.description: Animated superhero show with a mature and violent take on the genre, similar to 'One-Punch Man' but with more dramatic elements.

metas.name: Star Trek: Lower Decks
metas.description: Animated comedy set in the Star Trek universe, offering a humorous take on sci-fi, similar to 'Futurama'.

metas.name: Upload
metas.description: Sci-fi comedy with a unique premise about the afterlife, blending humor with thought-provoking themes.

metas.name: Resident Alien
metas.description: Sci-fi comedy about an alien hiding on Earth, combining humor with a mystery element, appealing to viewers who enjoy 'Doctor Who' and comedy shows.

metas.name: Miracle Workers
metas.description: Anthology comedy series with a different premise each season, known for its quirky humor and talented cast.

metas.name: Flight of the Conchords
metas.description: Musical comedy series with deadpan humor and catchy songs, offering a different style of comedy that might appeal to fans of 'Ted Lasso' and 'Scrubs'.

metas.name: Banshee
metas.description: Action-packed crime drama with intense fight scenes and a gritty atmosphere, appealing to fans of crime shows.

metas.name: Counterpart
metas.description: Spy thriller with a sci-fi twist, exploring parallel universes and espionage, similar to 'The Night Manager' and 'Foundation'.

metas.name: Travelers
metas.description: Sci-fi series about time travelers on a mission to save the future, appealing to fans of 'Doctor Who' and 'Foundation'.

metas.name: The Peripheral
metas.description: Sci-fi thriller with a mystery element, focusing on virtual reality and its consequences, related to 'Fallout'.

metas.name: The Expanse
metas.description: Hard sci-fi series with complex political intrigue and realistic space combat, related to 'Foundation'.

metas.name: Atlanta
metas.description: Comedy-drama with surreal elements exploring themes of race, culture, and music, blending humor and social commentary.

metas.name: Reservation Dogs
metas.description: Comedy-drama about Indigenous teenagers in rural Oklahoma, offering a unique perspective and humor.

metas.name: Extra Ordinary
metas.description: Horror comedy following a driving instructor with supernatural abilities, appealing to audiences who enjoy both comedy and supernatural themes.

metas.name: The IT Crowd
metas.description: British sitcom centered around the IT department of a large corporation, offering the same light-hearted humor found in Scrubs.
